details.description:
The New Balance 550 White Green features a smooth white leather upper with a grey suede toe wrap and green detailing. From there, a New Balance Basketball woven tongue label and matching sole completes the design.

The New Balance 550 White Green released in June of 2021 and retailed for $120.

The New Balance 550 White Grey features a white leather upper with monochromatic perforated leather overlays and puffed New Balance logos. From there, a woven New Balance Basketball tongue label and matching sole completes the design.

The New Balance 550 White Grey released in June of 2021 and retailed for $100.

Taking cues from the 1989 New Balance P550, the New Balance 550 White Black features a smooth white leather upper with perforated overlays and black piping. Puffed New Balance logos decorate the quarter panel. At the base, a matching white and black sole completes the design.

The New Balance 550 White Black released in November of 2021 and retailed for $110.

name: New Balance 550 Sea Salt Pack Marsh Green

details.description:
The Sea Salt Pack Marsh Green New Balance 550 offers a modern interpretation of classic basketball shoes by combining clean color tones with an age-old design. This low-top sneaker stands out with its Marsh Green accents against a crisp white base.

The Sea Salt Pack Marsh Green 550 iteration features a leather upper in a Sea Salt white tone with Marsh Green detailing on the heel tab, "N" branding, and outsole. The shoe has perforated panels for breathability, a sturdy rubber sole, and a lace-up closure for a secure fit​. New Balance branding is on the sole, with a marsh green "550" on the upper below the laces.

One thing we, the experts, like about the Sea Salt Pack Marsh Green New Balance 550 is the leather upper's perforated texture, which adds design depth. Another is the Marsh Green accents on the white and cream base. This sneaker retailed for $110 when it was released on May 24, 2024​.

The New Balance 550 White Timberwolf updates the New Balance 550, originally launched in 1989, with a neutral color scheme and premium materials.

This understated sneaker taps into vintage New Balance aesthetics with a low-top design and a slightly bulky silhouette. The tri-tone colorway features White, Timberwolf, and Raincloud, making the sneaker stand out from other versions of the New Balance 550 that only showcase two colors. The soft suede upper boasts leather overlays and perforations along the side panel and toe. The padded collar cushions the ankle and complements the foam tongue. Branding details include the signature "N" patch and the 550 logo on the lateral side panel.

Our experts love the visible stitching across the shoe, creating a quilted look and making the overlays stand out against the upper. The New Balance 550 White Timberwolf was released on June 30th, 2023, and retailed at $120.

The New Balance 550 Triple White is a reimagined design of the original 1989 New Balance 550, worn by pro ballers in the 80s and 90s.

Everything about this shoe is white, from its branding to its laces to its midsole. Its upper consists primarily of leather and slightly breathable mesh underlays. The upper sits on a cushioned midsole and a rubber outsole with patterns underneath for improved underground grip. Like the original, it features distinct stitching throughout its body, 550 branding and "N" logos on its sides, and NB branding on its outsole.

The New Balance 550 Triple White debuted on 10th October 2022 with an original retail price of $110.

name: New Balance 550 Sea Salt Pack Blue Agate

details.description: The New Balance 550 Sea Salt Pack Blue Agate is a fresh take on the classic silhouette, offering a perfect blend of style and comfort. This men's sneaker features a clean Sea Salt base with striking Blue Agate accents, creating a visually appealing contrast that's sure to turn heads. The premium leather upper provides durability and a luxurious feel, while the perforated detailing adds breathability and a touch of retro charm. Designed for both casual wear and athletic performance, the New Balance 550 Sea Salt Pack Blue Agate boasts a cushioned midsole for all-day comfort and a sturdy rubber outsole for excellent traction. The iconic 'N' logo adorns the sides, showcasing the brand's heritage and quality craftsmanship. With its versatile colorway and timeless design, this sneaker effortlessly complements a wide range of outfits, making it a must-have addition to any footwear collection. Our experts state this product is great for those seeking a stylish, comfortable sneaker that seamlessly transitions from day to night.

The New Balance 550 Turtledove White is a sneaker with a design that pays homage to the original design, which debuted in the 80s and was inspired by basketball culture.

This iteration of the New Balance 550 features a paneled off-white upper made entirely of calf leather. Both the toebox and the side panels feature perforations for extra breathability. The New Balance N Motif graces the sides in white outlined in perforation detailing, while 550 branding appears on the lateral side panel under the laces. The heel counter contains an NB logo, while the heel collar appears in white. The cushioned tongue also contains a New Balance logo patch. The off-white rubber sole is also layered and contains the NB logo and the New Balance brand name on the lateral side. The outsole is a light gray color.

Our favorite feature of these sneakers is the perforated detailing present on the entire upper. It gives the shoe extra visual appeal, while also increasing the functionality. The New Balance 550 Turtledove White was released on July 7, 2023, for a price of $120.

name: New Balance 550 Sea Salt Pine Green

details.description: The New Balance 550 Sea Salt Pine Green is a stylish and versatile sneaker that combines classic design with modern materials. The upper is made of premium leather and suede, with a sea salt and pine green colorway that adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit. The midsole is cushioned for comfort, while the rubber outsole provides excellent traction and durability. This sneaker is perfect for everyday wear, whether you're running errands or hitting the gym. The New Balance 550 Sea Salt Pine Green was released on February 5th, 2023, with a retail price of $120. Don't miss out on this must-have addition to your sneaker collection.

The New Balance 550 Terracotta is the re-release of a heritage basketball sneaker that first burst onto the scene in 1989.

This low-top sneaker features an upper of layered white leather. The panel extending from the lower eye stays down to the mudguard and then up toward the collar sports perforations to facilitate ventilation and enhance comfort. The iconic side panel "N" is made of puffy white leather. Other hits of branding include an embroidered "550" near the bottom most eyestays, a flying red "NB" on the white leather heel overlay, and red New Balance basketball branding on the tongue. The white cupsole midsole provides cushioning and sports tonal embossed branding. A red rubber outsole is grooved for multidirectional traction.

Our favorite aspects of this sneaker are the upper overlays at the collar and toe cap that give this shoe an added look of distinction. The New Balance 550 Terracotta was released on June 21, 2023, for a retail price of $120.

The New Balance 550 Cream Black features a smooth white leather upper with perforated overlays, black piping, mesh collars, and cracked leather New Balance logos. At the tongue, a New Balance Basketball woven label adds a vintage feel. From there, a matching sole with court grip completes the design.

The New Balance 550 Cream Black released in March of 2022 and retailed for $100.

With a similar look as the New Balance 550 Aimé Leon Dore Red, the New Balance 550 White Red features a white leather upper with red mesh collars and accents. At the quarter panel, a puffed New Balance logo nods to designs from New Balance's early basketball collections. From there, a woven New Balance tongue label completes the design.

The New Balance 550 White Red released in 2021 and retailed for $110.

The New Balance 550 Vintage Teal is a low-top model that is designed to embody the spirit of the 80s. It is a remake of the original model that was released by the American sport brand for professional basketball players in 1989.

This New Balance 550 model has a clean upper that has a white base made of leather. This is paired with various leather and suede overlays that are in shades of dark green and light gray. The classic NB logo appears on the side in white and green, and the shoe features bright white shoelaces and a matching white tongue. The toebox has a round design and the footcage includes multiple perforations for breathability.

One feature that our team of experts particularly enjoys about the New Balance 550 Vintage Teal is the rubber gum sole in white and dark green that is designed to provide support and traction. This model was first released on June 21st, 2023, and its starting retail price was $120.

name: New Balance 550 Sea Salt Pack Black

details.description:
The New Balance 550 Sea Salt Pack Black channels a vintage basketball image from the 80s while presenting in a sea salt and black color combination.

The 550 from New Balance is regularly updated, and new colorways are always appearing. This black iteration is one of four colorways that were released as part of the "Sea Salt" pack to pay homage to the sea, sand, and summer. The upper aims to provide breathability through the mesh toe box and perforated side panels. The sea salt colored base lends way to black accents throughout the shoe, which usually present as New Balance branding hits such as the puffy large Ns on the side panels.

What we love about the New Balance 550 Sea Salt Pack Black is its chunky midsole in an off-white color. It adds a retro vibe and adds an air of casualness. This shoe entered the marketplace on May 24, 2024, with a retail price of $110.

name: New Balance 550 White Blue Haze Rain Cloud

details.description:
The New Balance 550 White Blue Haze Rain Cloud comes in a white, blue haze, rain cloud color scheme.

The White Blue Haze Rain Cloud New Balance 550 showcases a white leather and mesh upper. It incorporates a REVlite midsole, ensuring lightweight cushioning for added comfort. With a rubber outsole, the shoe offers both grip and durability. The iconic "N" logo is present on each side, while the tongue displays "new balance 550 NB" branding. The heel features the "NB" logo. Completing the design, there is a "550" inscription on one side and "NB new balance" lettering on the midsole.

The New Balance 550 White Blue Haze Rain Cloud was released at a retail price of $120 on January 24, 2023.

The New Balance 550 White Nori combines white, nori, and brighton grey tones with a retro basketball vibe straight out of the 1980s.

Since being introduced in 1989, the New Balance 550 silhouette re-releases in different colorways. This version features a predominantly synthetic white upper with ventilation holes on the quarters for breathability. Brighton grey suede accents the toe cap, while earthy nori green highlights the heel and the signature oversized "N" branding on the sides. Additional branding details are found on the heel, midsole, and lateral quarter panel, where a black "550" is prominently stamped.

A standout detail is the tongue logo, a basketball graphic designed to look like it's bouncing toward you, adding a playful touch to its vintage aesthetic. With its gum outsole, thick midsole, oversized tongue, and chunky build, this shoe embodies classic basketball style. Retailing for $110, the New Balance 550 White Nori launched on April 1, 2024, as a nostalgic nod to old-school sneaker culture.

The New Balance 550 in Burnt Orange presents a minimalistic two-color design for this retro basketball silhouette that made its debut in 1989.

The Burnt Orange New Balance 550 low-top showcases a white leather upper, subtly complemented by accents in a Muted Orange hue. These accents can be found in the raised 'N' logo on the side panel, the Flying NB emblem on the heel, and the stitched New Balance tag atop the tongue. Additionally, a light gray suede overlay enhances the forefoot. The sneaker's foundation consists of a classic rubber cupsole, with an exposed foam wedge detail on the inner side.

What our experts love about the New Balance 550 Burnt Orange is its rich basketball heritage. Originally introduced as a basketball shoe, the 550 carries with it a legacy deeply rooted in the sport. Its classic design and court-ready silhouette pay homage to an era when footwear was evolving, and this colorway, Burnt Orange, celebrates its vintage roots. The sneaker debuted for $120 on February 23rd, 2023.

The 550 New Balance Silver Birch (Women's) shoes feature an all-over white and cream palette with perforations on their laterals.

The shoe has cream detailing rolling over the "N" logo, and the mesh heel tab found above the embossed vintage logo. The 550 New Balance Silver Birch (Women's) shoes have a cream heel clip that sits above a thick white midsole and a cream rubber outsole. You will find the New Balance Logo on both the insole and outsole, on the sides of the shoe, and at the shoe's back end.
    
  The 550 New Balance Silver Birch (Women's) shoe was released on the 25th May 2022 and retailed for $110.

name: New Balance 550 UNC White Dusk Blue (Women's)

details.description: The New Balance 550 UNC White Dusk Blue W is a sleek and stylish sneaker that combines classic design with modern materials. The upper is made from premium leather and features a clean white colorway with accents of dusk blue on the heel and branding. The midsole is crafted from durable rubber and provides excellent cushioning and support for all-day comfort. This sneaker is perfect for casual wear or for adding a touch of sophistication to any outfit. The release date for this shoe is January 8th, 2023, and with a retail price of $110. With its timeless design and high-quality construction, the New Balance 550 UNC White Dusk Blue W is a must-have for any sneaker enthusiast.

The New Balance 550 White Linen (Women's) is a sleek and stylish sneaker that combines classic design with modern comfort. This women's-specific model features a clean white leather upper accented with subtle linen-colored details, creating a versatile look that pairs effortlessly with any outfit. The iconic 'N' logo adorns the side panels, while perforations on the toe box and side walls enhance breathability for all-day wear. Built on New Balance's heritage basketball silhouette, the 550 offers excellent support and cushioning for everyday use. The low-top design provides freedom of movement, while the padded collar and tongue ensure a snug, comfortable fit. The durable rubber outsole delivers reliable traction on various surfaces, making these sneakers ideal for both casual outings and light athletic activities. Our experts state this product is great for fashion-forward women seeking a timeless sneaker that blends retro charm with contemporary appeal.
